'''Radiant Harvest''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/09/28 10:00 - 2023/10/09 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Unlock any [[Statue of The Seven]] in [[Fontaine]]
* Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"

===Summary===
* During the event, Travelers can collect Violetglow Jellyfish in collection areas. Collect a certain number of them to complete the challenge. Complete the challenges to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]], and [[Mora]].
* From the first day of the event, a new collection area will unlock every day. A total of seven challenges will be unlocked.
* Travelers can collect Violetglow Jellyfish in collection areas. Collect a certain number of them to complete the challenge. Complete the challenges to obtain Primogems, Weapon Ascension Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.
* Turbulent Rings and Turbulent Bubbles may appear within the collection area. Use these Rings and Bubbles to explore the collection area more easily.

===Tutorial===

|text4    = After you have stayed within the retrieval area for a while, the light from nearby Violetglow Jellyfish will seemingly show their positions...
}}
